TopicTitle: First time playing, still on demo, but still...

Articles.Content:
Ok, this is kind of cool. I don't know how I managed it, but I put my capsule into a stable elliptical orbit around the SUN! And on my 3rd rocket design.

I was not trying for it though. It was a complete accident. It would have been far more impressive if I had meant to do it.
Pretty good for a third rocket! I'd had quite a few more explosions before I got to the point of actually succeeding at anything.
You basically went so fast and so high you left kerbins gravity well.

Cool. Just what you need to get to the new planets in the 0.17 release.

But you will need the full version....

*hint*

Congratulations! Perhaps you could also get your Kerbals back home some day, provided that you haven't run out of fuel. Also, did you know that you'll soon be able to use this to go to other planets in the full version of the game? Buy it, it'll be worth it!
Yes, KSP 0.17 is more worth than few computer games blockbusters, for fraction of money , nothing more to say - just buy ^^.
